Description: Casey had just received her driving licence in the mail and had immediately driven to the ends of the nearest forest. The car park was empty, and it looked like nobody had parked there in a while. Putting the car in park, Casey jumped out of the car, quickly locking in before she began jogging into the forest.
Author: no_stories_without

Description: When Izzie had reached for Casey's hand, she had been scared that the other girl would pull away and she would realise that she had misread the situation. But the second her fingers had reached Casey’s and felt the other girl welcome her hand into her own, she had noticed the way that Caseys’ breathing had changed and a slight smile had appeared on her face, and she had known that she hadn’t been wrong. She had known that all of the feelings she’d been harbouring for Casey were reciprocated and that both excited and terrified her at the same time.
Author: casualfanficwriter

Description: Casey has repressed her sexuality for long enough, and feelings finally show through at a party, after some... light drinking. Suddenly she finds herself face to face with someone she's never talked to, let alone liked. And now, it seems, they're also soulmates.
Author: Aaaarrrrgggghhhh

Description:
Nate's not an idiot.  Well, he is in a lot of ways, but...not about this.  
Aka a one-shot from Nate's POV realizing that his girlfriend is maybe not as straight as she thinks she is.
Author: not_here_leave_a_message

Description:
If you’d told Izzie that Casey listened to Taylor Swift, she wouldn’t have believed it. Maybe the Casey she knows now, but certainly, definitely, not the transferring-schools and girl-punching version of Casey she’d known when they first met.
So when Casey suggests putting on a playlist she’d made that includes the entirety of Taylor Swift’s discography as they assemble a pillow fort, Izzie is more than shocked.
or: a pillow fort is made, things get confusing, and our girls listen to a lot of Taylor Swift
Author: Kidfish

Description: I’m bad at summaries....Casey has never questioned anything in her life, so why was she questioning this?
Author: CHIKDNOODLE
Fanfic_Title: Slow and Steady Wins The Race

Description:
Casey is an ex-track star who makes a living as a track coach in suburban California after her career was cut short. Izzie is a single mom who has been running from her past for a decade. When her precocious daughter with a propensity for matchmaking joins Casey's middle school track team... well, you can guess the rest. 
aka the track coach au nobody asked for
Author: allthisandheaven_too
Fanfic_Title: i wanted everyone to know that you're the girl for me

Description: Casey and Izzy's forehead promise scene had Elsa not so rudely interrupted.
Author: thebrickmaster

Description: Casey meets a helpful stranger on the subway.
Author: ButtonsBows

Description:
Casey and Izzie + the prompt "things you said after you kissed me." A 4 + 1 story involving kisses and almost-kisses.
***
Izzie just shakes her head. “Screw him,” she shoots back. “No, I was—afraid of losing you.”
And: Oh. That… that does something unexpected to her, pokes at some feeling Casey can’t identify. There’s something that feels like a string, tugging between her heart and her stomach; a rubber band stretching tight. She takes a breath, feels hot behind her ears and behind her eyes. “Oh,” she says, because she can’t think of anything else.
Author: morningsound15

Description: Izzie has feelings for Casey, but doesn't know how to tell her. In a fit of anxiety, she asks for a "forehead promise" just because she needs to be close to her, even if it means being pushed away. (AU where Ella doesn't interrupt Izzie and Casey and Casey & Evan aren't together)
Author: amandasmystery
Fanfic_Title: i don't want to hide, not tonight.

Description: Maybe Elsa helped her dodge a bullet after all...
Author: thesoulofchaos

Description:
One might say that when you're in love, you see things through a different filter. And when you ask people how and when did they figured out a person is the one, they would tell you that they knew from the start. But that isn't the case, not for Casey at least. There is no filter because she sees Izzie for who she really is. In fact, She never knew when she started falling for her. It's the kind of disaster that you won't know would happen until it hits you right in the face. 
 
or the cazzie christmas au we all deserve
Author: atypical

Description: Izzie and Casey meet at a 'local' coffee shop, but it isn't exactly love at first sight.
Author: Godilovefandoms

Description:
Here's a thing or two about the laws of the universe: opposites attract, objects in motion will stay in motion unless a force is acted upon and lastly, Casey and Izzie are, believe it or not, destined to be there for each other. 
or
The cazzie winter formal au where Casey asks for Izzie's help because she has no idea what to do. There's dancing and pining and everything else in between.
Author: atypical

Description:
There are certain, unexpected yet inevitable things that feel right. 
Izzie happens to be one of them.
Author: atypical

Description: ‘Imagine a world like that.’

Description: Casey and Izzie are forced to share a tent on a school trip days after the 7-11 parking lot. Post-season 2 finale.

Fanfic_Title: i will be the one you need (i just can't be without you)

Description:
Season 2 from Izzie's Point of View. 
 
It's just been bugging my brain what Izzie was thinking the entire season....So here it is!

Description: Casey bites off more than she can chew when she gets into a fight with Nate.
Author: allthisandheaven_too

Description: This fanfic is about Casey and Izzie's relationship after the season finale and how Casey dealed with Evan and all of her new feelings about Izzie. There are other charecters as Casey's family but it's not the main thing, so... they will appear just a little.
Author: untiltheveryend03

Description:
Here’s the thing. Izzie isn’t really confused about anything. She’s known for awhile. But it’s enough coming into a new fancy private school knowing you’re going to be different. There’s no way she was going to add lesbian on top of all of that.
or the one where Izzie is a lesbian, cause it honestly kinda makes sense?
Author: endlesspossibilities

Description: Casey and Izzie attempt to navigate their relationship but meet some hurdles along the way. (please note: i altered the world a little so clayton prep is a catholic school)
Author: dancedanceresolution

Description:
“I need your help,” she says, voice remarkably steady given her state.
Izzie sits next to her. “Of course,” she says softly. “With what?”
Casey stares out at the road, gaze unfocused.
Izzie cautiously places a hand on the small of her back. “Casey?”
Casey turns to Izzie, but she keeps her eyes down.
“I’m pregnant,” she whispers.
Author: allthisandheaven_too

Description: Izzie had a hard time to keep her feelings for Casey from growing. It's the first time she gets to feel so deeply about someone, and it scares her. The worst part is that Casey isn't even accessible, or is she?
Author: avengerskye

Description:
Casey is always the first place Izzie runs to.
TW: Domestic violence is the crux of this entire story and gets mentioned a lot, occasionally in detail.
Author: allthisandheaven_too

Description: Casey and Izzie just drove 3 towns over to get Cotton Candy flavoured slurpees...now what?

Description: I suck at summary’s but it’s mostly just Casey and izzie cuddling

Description:
You may not have things figured out right now, but you know one thing with certainty.
Nothing feels better than this.
 
Inspired by Khalid - Better

Description: Casey makes a decision about what to do.

Fanfic_Title: Can We Really Be Just Friends

Description: Set after 2x10. Izzie and Casey have a lot of feelings for each other, but Casey isn't ready to admit hers.After a while, the two come together, and the feelings rise to the surface.
Author: omgbellamy

Description: Tumbrl prompt 'Pls write about Casey chose Evan but everytime she's with him, all she thinks about is Izzie. Also, a jealous Casey would be nice to read. Up to you who she'd be jealous of.. Nate or another girl perhaps? ☺ happy writing! Hihi'
Author: Thatoneloser_kid

Description: 'the fort to you was like every castle in every fairy-tale. It was a fictional world that you shared, so different from real life.'
Author: sunflivower

Description:
Casey transfers colleges mid-semester to be closer to home. This college has a great running programme and a multitude of courses. But the downside it comes with a less than pleased roommate. 
Izzie had been lucky enough to get a room all to herself for the first half of the semester. The first time in years that she didn’t have to share her room with anybody. She finally had this small space all to herself. Until, she comes back to her dorm mid-semester to find a pile of suitcases and bags and bedsheets.
Author: killingsteve

Description: Izzie's not afraid of spiders.  So really, in a way, she's not afraid of anything.
Author: not_here_leave_a_message

Description: this story takes place on the car sceneTM, and further with what I would've loved that happened. also, there is no Evan, so Izzie and Casey are both single and ready to be the cutest couple on this earth.hope you enjoy it!
Author: kaleydioscope

Description:
“That’s good,” Izzie chirped happily, a certain rigidness in her shoulders that Casey just took note of. “I’m glad you’re happy. You and Sam and your dad and Evan—all of you guys.” Izzie’s eyes weren’t shining anymore. “I should go now though, I think one of the girls wanted a ride back home, and I don’t really drink, so you know. Designated driver for the night.”
But you drank with me, she wanted to say. But I’m not happy. I haven’t been happy. This is actually the first time I’ve been close to happy and it’s because I saw you again.
“Have fun, Casey.”
Author: RedTheWriter
Fanfic_Title: its too cold for you here

Description: Things would be easier if emotions had a map
Author: sadboiband

Description: izzie gets tired of casey avoiding her and decides to do something about it

Description: This takes place right at the end of S2, and explores Casey’s point of view through the process of figuring out her feelings.
Author: AwkwardNarwhal

Description:
“She fell asleep in record’s time. You can’t help but steal small glances at her – ok, maybe you’re full on staring at this point. But the movie is dumb, and she looks so peaceful that your eyes are inevitably drawn to her.”
or
Five times Casey wants to kiss Izzie, and one time she does
Author: missmister128

Description:
“It’s just, sometimes, a thing feels, like… so right. You know?” 
Of right and wrong, and maybe the spaces in between.
Author: WishingTree
Fanfic_Title: don't wish, don't start (wishing only wounds the heart)

Description: three times izzie falls in love with casey.one time casey falls in love with izzie.

Description: A few things that running and loving someone have in common.
Author: emiliefitch

Description: She breaks up with Evan on the third of July.
Author: lhknox

Description:
„Aw, watch it, Newton. Or else I am inevitably going to think that you’re in love with me.“ Izzie gazes up at her, a smirk on her face. Casey stares down at her and she can’t think, because the girl is making her heart flutter inside her chest–
Suddenly an idea pops up in Casey’s head and her sober inner-voice is already screaming internally, wondering how she could ever think that the prospect of this plan was brilliant.„I could… pretend to be your girlfriend.“ she bursts out.
 or: the one where Casey pretends to be Izzie's girlfriend to help her get rid of Nate.
Author: wontbutyoumight

Description:
The thing about Izzie, and by extension, Clayton Prep, is that Casey has always sort of been halfway in love with them from the very beginning. 
or
the one where they hold hands too much and talk too little
Author: holcene

Description: Inside Izzie's mind during the time she wasn't talking to Casey
Author: strawberriesNcigarettes

Description: casey writes izzie a love note.
Author: getyourheadinthegame

Description: Casey has spent so long repressing her true feelings, growing up with Sam will do that to you, so she’s gotten really good at not analyzing them or figuring out what it all means. All she knows is, Izzie makes her happy and she enjoys her company. So, it only makes sense that things would come to a head and crash down eventually, because let’s be real, this is her life you’re talking about here.
Author: AgentDanvers
Fanfic_Title: Life is a Marathon (or some other cliched garbage, Casey thinks)

Description: The aftermath of the breakup with Evan. Though Casey and Izzie haven't figured out where they stand, they both know it's positive. They spend valuable time together, doing nothing but stealing shy looks and little touches.
Author: Godilovefandoms

Description: I’m bad at summaries butIt’s after 7/11

Description: Casey is not autistic like Sam, but she’s not like Evan or Beth or Zahid either.
Author: luthorial

Description: Izzie plays guitar and writes a song for Casey who is too impatient and tries to persuade Izzie to play it for her
Author: laurastewart
Fanfic_Title: "Stop staring Newton I'll start thinking you're in love with me or something"

Description:
"Izzie studies the taller girl silently until a playful smile spreads out on her face - she has an idea. She doesn’t know where this sudden idea comes from - all she knows is that she somehow has to go through with it, to just act on her feelings.„This is going to sound stupid, but… dance with me,“ Izzie mumbles, brushing a strand of her dark brown hair behind her ear. "

or: Izzie teaches Casey how to dance and asks her to go to prom with her.
Author: wontbutyoumight
Fanfic_Title: i don't know how you feel (but all I want is you)

Description:
“So guess what?” 
Izzie tries to guess what news Casey has for her. Maybe something about Sam, or maybe her parents’. Though her voice is upbeat so the latter is probably out of the question.
“I had sex again.”
Oh. 
or: an exploration of feelings in the car
Author: Kidfish
Fanfic_Title: the ice that slips down my spine (from having you on my mind)

Description: "And then Casey kisses him before she is able to reach the first step - really kisses him, wrapping her arms around his neck and Izzie can’t stop herself from staring at them for a few moments (and it feels like forever), wondering if Evan knows how lucky he really is. The burning sting in her chest eventually becomes too much for her and she tears her gaze away from what could have been her if it weren’t for him. God, she wishes she knew what that felt like."
Author: wontbutyoumight

Description: 3 times Izzie falls asleep when they are watching a movie and 1 time Casey does too
Author: cordeliagoodx

Description: Casey forgets her keys and Izzie returns her pyjamas. Also their first kiss but that’s clearly not the most important thing here.

Fanfic_Title: You make me less cold, Casey.

Description:
For a moment, there’s no party downstairs; no parents, no Sam, no Evan. There’s just her and Izzie, in their own little bubble, safe under the glow of the fairy lights in Casey’s room.
or
from the forehead promise, to the car, and beyond.

Fanfic_Title: it has to be clear (it has to be right)

Description: Casey's unprecedented feelings for Izzie snowball in a way she doesn't understand or have any desire to fight, and it's up to her to do what's right for everyone, including herself.

Description: Casey and Izzie go on one of their normal weekend runs together, but then Izzie decides to up the stakes.

Description:
Casey has been sent to Clayton Boarding School for Girls. She's obviously not thrilled about this, but will a certain dark haired track star change her mind?
My state is currently being hit by a hurricane. I'll try to update when I can, but power has been going in and out here. Leave me comment/suggestions! Honestly don't know what direction I'm going with this yet.

Description: “Casey might not fully understand what she was feeling yet but she definitely wanted to figure that out with Izzie at her side.”

Fanfic_Title: i see you’re focused, yeah, you're so independent

Description: And like a comet it crashes into her, pulling her closer and closer until she’s knocked out of orbit and plummeting forward until she is burning, every molecule of her being vaporising, stripping apart, and it hurts more than anything she’s ever felt but it means she gets to be a part of her so she lets herself sink further and further until all she can see is the blinding bright light of the sun.
Author: Halxe

Description: What happens when a girl loses her best friend? Her new go to person? How can Casey come to terms with losing someone she bonded with so quickly and so easily? Casey's doubts just grow as her birthday grows worse for her until a rather unexpected ending.orCasey is struggling to keep it together without having someone to just listen to her. Someone who makes her feel heard, especially after losing Izzie.

Description: Izzie is upset so she goes to see her best friend who tries to cheer her up.

Nate was a good kisser but sometimes… she felt nothing. This was one of the times. She kept doing it.
But it didn't feel right.
She didn’t feel right." 
{Cazzie} {Casey x Izzie}
